Posts.Content: Thank you Karen, this is certainly positive news. This second cycle of chemo is really kicking in, was aching all over yesterday, everywhere. Trying to find a comfy position to sit was an education! Did not have any aching on the first cycle but guess it must be the drugs doing their bit  Xx
Posts.Title: Softening of lump

Posts.Content: Just seen oncologist today and lump is softer, although same size. What does this mean, folks, they said it is a good sign. Anyone else been told this? This is after only the first treatment of chemo and third day into second cycle.  C xx
Posts.Title: Softening of lump
